Sentencas: Precise porosity control is highly desirable for improving the electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Controlling Porosity of Anode Support in Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Freeze Casting

Sentencas: Freeze casting is an established method for enabling high bulk porosity in structures and controlling pore orientation.
Titulo: Controlling Porosity of Anode Support in Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Freeze Casting

Sentencas: In this study, freeze casting was used to fabricate tubular, anode-supported SOFCs with aligned and varying amounts of porosity by controlling the solids/water ratio in different casting slurries.
Titulo: Controlling Porosity of Anode Support in Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Freeze Casting

Sentencas: SOFCs were prepared with a Ni/yttria and scandia stabilized zirconia (ScYSZ) anode support (AS), an anode functional layer (AFL), a ScYSZ electrolyte, a lanthanum strontium manganite (LSM)/ScYSZ cathode interlayer (CIL), and an LSM cathode.
Titulo: Controlling Porosity of Anode Support in Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Freeze Casting

Sentencas: The permeability of the anode support was found to increase from 1.4 x 10(-2)to 1.8 x 10(-2)m(2)as porosity was increased from 57 to 64 vol%, while the total cell resistance decreased by 35% from 0.93 to 0.60 Ohm cm(2).
Titulo: Controlling Porosity of Anode Support in Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Freeze Casting

Sentencas: When evaluated with 30 vol% H(2)as the fuel at 800 degrees C, the decrease of concentration polarization enabled an increase in electrochemical performance by 42% from 0.35 to 0.50 W/cm(2)as the porosity in the anode support was increased.
Titulo: Controlling Porosity of Anode Support in Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Freeze Casting

Sentencas: Mechanical strength characterization using a three-point method showed there is a practical upper limit of the amount of porosity that can be designed into the anode support.
Titulo: Controlling Porosity of Anode Support in Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Freeze Casting

Sentencas: This work paves a way for controlling porosity by freeze casting and understanding the correlation between porosity and concentration polarization losses in SOFCs.
Titulo: Controlling Porosity of Anode Support in Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Freeze Casting
